MIME element (text/plain)
Hello, 
 
I just want to follow up with you on this issue which I notify you a
couple of days ago. 
 
This website hosted in your server
http://www.myhappylove.com/lyrics/dating-advice.html 
 
is using my content without any permission and he copy most of my
content. 
 
You can check my website here : 
http://www.datingclass.com/dating/index.shtml 
 
Please forward and notify the webmaster for this domain. The email that
he uses in the domain registration bounced. Would hope this issue to be
settle without taking any legal action. 
 
I hope your company is not supporting this type of illegal act. 
 
Regards,
David 
 
 
 
On 1/10/07, David Kwan <datingclass@gmail.com> wrote: 
> Hello,
> 
> Follow up on the subject : myhappylove.com - illegal content which I 
> send earlier ...
> 
> Please notice that the email stated in the domain registration contact
bounced. 
> http://whois.domaintools.com/myhappylove.com
> 
> I hope your company can take a look at this or can provide me the real

> email, the webmaster used.
> 
> Thanks. 
> 
> Regards,
> David K
> 
> 
>

wrote:
